title: Titan Quest: Anniversary Edition [v1.47 + ALL DLC]
description:
Release date: August 31, 2016 ~ November 17, 2017
Genre: RPG, Action RPG, Isometric, 3D
Developer: Iron Lore Entertainment
Interface language: Russian, Ukrainian, English
Language of voice: Russian, English

Release info:
Release includes: All DLCs + Ragnarok DLC

The repack is based on the ISO-image Titan.Quest.Anniversary.Edition.Ragnarok-PLAZA: plaza-titan.quest.anniversary.edition.ragnarok.iso (8,609,923,072 bytes)
Version of the game: v1.47
100% Lossless and MD5 Perfect: all files after installation are identical to the original release to within a bit (not counting remote locations)
Removed all the localizations, except Russian and English, NOTHING converted to anything.
Installation takes 10-30 minutes (depends on your system and selected languages)
After installation, the game takes up to 7 GB
After installation, the option to check the checksums of all files is available to make sure that the repack is installed correctly
The language changes in the game settings. When installing only English voice acting, you can play with the Russian interface and English sound
The repack uses ZTool library from Razor12911

How to install:
Mount and Install
Play
